description:
I like a lot of skirmish games. There’s something about controlling the battlefield, triggering special abilities, and capturing objectives. Dexterity games also intrigue me as you replace dice or card luck with your own fine motor skills. But what happens when you mix them together? You get Catacombs and Castles by Elzra Games which plays […]

Source
title: Catacombs and Castles Review
